content: Write regression tests for interactive shorthand parsing in session mode.

{"summary": "Write regression tests for interactive shorthand parsing in session mode by testing the _rewrite_interactive_command_parts function in elephant_cli.py. The tests should cover basic rewriting, slash-to-command prefix mapping, and handling of malformed input.", "project": {"language": "python"}, "files": [{"path": "tests/test_session_shorthand.py", "content": """"Tests for interactive shorthand parsing in session mode."""

from __future__ import annotations

import importlib.util
import sys
from pathlib import Path


def _load_cli_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    cli_path = root / "scripts" / "elephant_cli.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("elephant_cli_local", cli_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/elephant_cli.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


elephant_cli = _load_cli_module()


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_basic():
    """Basic rewriting of command parts."""
    parts = ["plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_slash_prefix():
    """Slash prefix should be converted to command name."""
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_empty():
    """Empty input should return empty list."""
    parts = []
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == []


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_only_slash():
    """Slash alone should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["/"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_multiple_slashes():
    """Multiple slash-prefixed commands should be rewritten."""
    parts = ["/plan", "/code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_mixed_slash_and_normal():
    """Mixed slash and normal commands should be rewritten correctly."""
    parts = ["plan", "/code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_flags():
    """Flags and arguments should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/session", "--id", "test123", "--output", "json"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["session", "--id", "test123", "--output", "json"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_equals():
    """Arguments with equals signs should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan", "--task=add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task=add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_quoted_args():
    """Quoted arguments should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", '"add feature"']
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task", '"add feature""]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_special_chars():
    """Special characters in arguments should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", "add-feature_v2"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task", "add-feature_v2"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_unicode():
    """Unicode characters in arguments should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", "添加功能"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan", "--task", "添加功能"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_long_command():
    """Long command names should be handled correctly."""
    parts = ["/verylongcommandname", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["verylongcommandname", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_numeric_command():
    """Numeric command names should be handled correctly."""
    parts = ["/123", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["123", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_mixed_case():
    """Mixed case command names should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/PlAn", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["PlAn", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_trailing_slash():
    """Trailing slash should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan/", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan/", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_leading_whitespace():
    """Leading whitespace in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["  /plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["  plan", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_trailing_whitespace():
    """Trailing whitespace in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan  ", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan  ", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_internal_whitespace():
    """Internal whitespace in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan  code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan  code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_multiple_spaces():
    """Multiple spaces in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan   code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan   code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_tabs():
    """Tabs in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\tcode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\tcode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_newlines():
    """Newlines in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\ncode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\ncode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_control_chars():
    """Control characters in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\x00code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\x00code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_null_bytes():
    """Null bytes in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\x00code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\x00code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_surrogate_pairs():
    """Surrogate pairs in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\uD800\uDC00code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\uD800\uDC00code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_bom():
    """Byte order mark in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\uFEFFcode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\uFEFFcode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_zero_width_chars():
    """Zero width characters in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\u200Bcode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\u200Bcode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_rtl_chars():
    """Right-to-left characters in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\u061Ccode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\u061Ccode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_emoji():
    """Emoji in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\U0001F600code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\U0001F600code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_private_use():
    """Private use characters in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\uE000code", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\uE000code", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_unassigned():
    """Unassigned code points in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\uF8FFcode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\uF8FFcode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_replacement_char():
    """Replacement character in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\uFFFDcode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\uFFFDcode", "--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_with_infinity():
    """Infinity in command should be preserved."""
    parts = ["/plan\u221Ecode", "--task", "add feature"]
    result = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert result == ["plan\u221Ecode", "--task", "add feature"]
